Find.definition: to come upon accidentally or through effort [ found a valuable antique in the old desk] [ found a buyer for the property] 2
Find.origin: [ found a valuable antique in the old desk]

1.definition: to come upon accidentally or through effort [a valuable antique in the old desk] [a buyer for the property]

2.definition: to make a judicial determination regarding [the testimony not credible] [the defendant guilty] compare,to make a judicial determination [the juryin favor of the plaintiff]
